actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 406 of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to limit the authority of the Civil Aeronautics Board with respect to subsidy payments for the transportation of mail.

summary.text: Limits the authority of the Civil Aeronautics Board, under the Federal Aviation Act of 1958, to make payments for the transportation of mail to the amounts appropriated to the Board for that purpose.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 406 of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to limit the authority of the Civil Aeronautics Board with respect to subsidy payments for the transportation of mail.
